Content:: Hunting Time (Turkish: Av Zamanı) is a 1988 Turkish drama film directed by Erden Kıral about the 1980 Turkish coup d'état. It was entered into the 38th Berlin International Film Festival.[1][2]  This article related to a Turkish film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This 1980s drama film–related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
